root.name: Virtual Horse Ranch II
root.description: This game is very realistic and engrossing because there is many different breeds to choose from and if you are unsatisfied you may purchase a pair of the breed you like best. You may compete, breed, train and do almost anything with your horses. It gives you a chance to feel what it would be like to have your own ranch Limits: there is a 40 horse cap but most people probably won't need that many. You need tokens to change to certain colors if you want like a blue or purple horse or something and other small details unlimited: you may breed as many times as you want and can get rid of horses you don't want. You may play without any restrictions! It is a whole new world to check out. there are so many different breeds to choose from and if you want to add a breed you can purchase tokens for that!
